    \index{reliafree \textit{(package)}!reliafree.function \textit{(module)}|(}
\section{Module reliafree.function}

    \label{reliafree:function}
This is the Class that is used to represent and hold information related to
the functions of the Program.


%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%
%%                                Classes                                %%
%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%

\subsection{Classes}

\begin{itemize}  \setlength{\parskip}{0ex}
  \item \textbf{Function}: The Function class is used to represent a function in a system being 
analyzed.



  \textit{(Section \ref{reliafree:function:Function}, p.~\pageref{reliafree:function:Function})}

\end{itemize}
